page.title: 20SESSAY - A CARING VILLAGE
page.content: People in Sessay are most generous. {Internationally}we have supported Thirsk Deanery Appeals in Africa and India. Vests have been knitted for Ethiopia and a blind African child has been supported for one year. There is an annual collection for Christian Aid. {Nationally}and{locally,}carol singing has supported research projects,child- rens societies and hospital appeals. A sale of work by the blind, Christingle services for C of E Children's Society and collections for Red Cross & Poppy Day also raise money. Sunday Club's concert was for a children's hospice. Money has been raised by a sponsored walk, an attic auction, a barbecue and family bingo for a school computer, school funds, & repairs to Lych gate. Some ladies help in a thrift shop which supports a local Cheshire Home.
